content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions for assembly.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
The image shows two separate structures:

1. Left Structure:
- 4 layers total
- Red house-like shape on top
- Two orange cylindrical pillars
- Two yellow horizontal beams
- Has an arched opening

2. Right Structure:
- 3 layers total
- Red blocks with circular opening
- Yellow horizontal beams
- Red arched base
- Has circular and arched openings

Let me provide the assembly instructions for both structures:

Left Structure Assembly:
{
Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch left)
Step2: Move block with index 2 (red arch right)
Step3: Move block with index 6 (yellow horizontal beam)
Step4: Move block with index 10 (orange vertical cylinder)
Step5: Move block with index 11 (orange vertical cylinder)
Step6: Move block with index 6 (yellow horizontal beam)
Step7: Move block with index 3 (red arch piece)
Step8: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular roof)
}

Right Structure Assembly:
{
Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch left)
Step2: Move block with index 2 (red arch right)
Step3: Move block with index 6 (yellow horizontal beam)
Step4: Move block with index 4 (red circular opening)
Step5: Move block with index 6 (yellow horizontal beam)
}

The assembly sequence ensures stability by building from bottom to top, placing support structures before adding upper elements.
